main.name: Abdallah Wario
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Aballah Wario!. I've been coding for over 5 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, I help my friends learn JS and later introduce them to React. Through live coaching sessions on Google Meet, I have  demonstrated how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help my friends and anyone interested enter the world of web development.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree,Mathematics and  Computer Science(Pure Maths Option)

work.title: Junior Dev
work.description: Worked on different modules of the company's web app.It was a tour and safaris company that enabled users to view destinations and do a booking.

testimonials.text: Abdallah is an absolute team player,he helped us in developing our Safiri Africa web app in time and delivered quality
Learning with Abdallah has been AWESOME,he made javascript so easy to understand for us and we built several projects
